name: uptime-monitor
description: Monitor website uptime by registering URLs, performing HTTP health checks, and tracking availability history. Supports configurable intervals, timeouts, and expected status codes.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: uptime_monitor
toolDefinition.description: Monitor website uptime. Register URLs to watch, perform HTTP health checks, view current status, and review check history.

action.description: add (register URL), remove (unregister), check (probe now), status (current state), list (all monitors), history (past checks)

url.description: URL to monitor or check (must be http:// or https://)

id.description: Monitor ID (for remove, check, status, history actions)

name.description: Friendly name for the monitor (optional, used with add)

timeout.description: Request timeout in ms (optional, default: 10000, max: 30000)

limit.description: Number of history entries to return (optional, default: 20)
